author: DTNEXT Bureau
title: Martyr’s widow to youngest cadet, grit and passion on display at OTA
text: Martyr’s widow to youngest cadet, grit and passion on display at OTA The completion of training saw many stories of grit, passion and tales of surmounting challenges as seen in the case of one jawan trained as a civil engineer hailing from an agrarian family. CHENNAI: In a poignant story, the widow of an IAF aviator, who died along with India’s first CDS General Bipin Rawat in a chopper crash in the Nilgiris, was commissioned into the Indian Army on Saturday at a function held at Officers Training Academy (OTA) in Chennai. The completion of training saw many stories of grit, passion and tales of surmounting challenges as seen in the case of one jawan trained as a civil engineer hailing from an agrarian family. Scores of cadets who underwent gruelling training at the OTA included Shauryan Thapa, who is the sixth generation member of his family to don the Army uniform, especially the youngest (21 years) candidate in the academy. He was awarded the OTA gold medal at the passing out parade today as the best performing cadet among the 184 officers. Shauryan would join his father Col Mohit Thapa in serving the 7/8 Gorkha Rifles. Yashwini Dhaka, daughter of an Army man, widowed with the death of Squadron Leader Kuldeep Singh, a pilot of the Indian Air Force’s helicopter, who died on duty flying Chief of Defence Staff General Bipin Rawat to the Defence Services Staff College, Wellington, Udhagamandalam in 2017, when the aircraft crashed. She surmounted what was in store for her and four years later passed out of the OTA as an Army officer. This tragedy altered the life of Yashwini and she chose to don the olive green uniform. “Conventionally, the OTA intake is for those aged 21 and 27. This Veer Nari had to get acclimatised to an all new life while keeping up with her batch mates much younger than her,” a release from the OTA said. Recovering from her personal loss, she became an Army officer to make her husband proud. In the case of Saranya M, hailing from an agrarian family in Tamil Nadu’s Erode district, a career in the Indian Army seemed to fascinate her. This civil engineer and also the first graduate in her family spurned her job in an IT firm and opted to train at the OTA and become a commissioned officer.

author: @infoitestero
title: Accordo di cessate il fuoco tra Hamas e Israele: un passo verso la pace
text: [](/a/14CD9065-2BC0-49C8-B18A-7DA3EF2BC489/Hamas-accetta-il-cessate-il-fuoco) Italia Oggi 5/7/2024 Hamas ha fatto sapere ai mediatori, Egitto e Qatar di accettare la proposta di cessate il fuoco. Il leader del gruppo islamista, Ismail Haniyeh, ha informato il premier del Qatar Mohammed bin Abdul Rahman Al Thani e il… Hamas ha accettato la proposta di Egitto e Qatar per un accordo di cessate il fuoco con Israele. Questa decisione è stata presa in un tentativo disperato di fermare l'irruzione dei soldati israeliani a Rafah, una città stremata da sei mesi di guerra. Tuttavia, Israele ha aumentato la pressione militare su Hamas con attacchi mirati, aerei e di artiglieria, nella parte orientale della città al sud della Striscia. Il leader del gruppo islamista, Ismail Haniyeh, ha informato il premier del Qatar Mohammed bin Abdul Rahman Al Thani e il capo dell'intelligence egiziana Abbas Kamel dell'approvazione da parte del movimento della loro proposta sull'accordo di cessate il fuoco. Tuttavia, la decisione finale è ancora in sospeso.La situazione rimane tesa e incerta. Mentre Hamas ha accettato la proposta di cessate il fuoco, Israele ha aumentato la pressione militare. La comunità internazionale attende con ansia ulteriori sviluppi.

author: Air Methods Corporation - (GLOBE NEWSWIRE)
title: Air Methods Successfully Completes Financial Restructuring | News | bakersfield.com
text:
DENVER, Dec. 28, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Air Methods Corporation (“Air Methods” or the “Company”), the leading air medical service provider in the U.S., announced today that it has successfully emerged from Chapter 11 with significantly reduced debt and increased liquidity that positions the Company for long-term success.
Air Methods is moving forward as an industry leader in air medical services and as an integral link between the nation’s top healthcare facilities and people in rural and remote communities. The Company continues to provide best-in-class clinical quality of care through its fleet of 365 medical helicopters and fixed-wing aircraft, operating from 275 bases and serving 47 states.

author: Notimerica
title: Los trabajadores de Boeing en EEUU van a la huelga y rechazan la subida del 25% en los sueldos
text: MADRID, 13 Sep. (EUROPA PRESS) - El sindicato de los trabajadores de Boeing en en la región de Seattle (EE.UU.) ha convocado una huelga por primera vez en 16 años y ha rechazado la oferta del fabricante para subir un 25% los salarios. Según recoge DPA, el 94,65% de los trabajadores votaron que no a la oferta que lanzó Boeing para evitar los paros, que contemplaba una subida salarial del 25% en cuatro años, mejorar en las coberturas sanitarias y las jubilaciones, dado que el sindicato IAM había pedido inicialmente un incremento del 40% en los salarios. Además, el 96% apoyó la convocatoria de huelga. La huelga ha comenzado a las 00.00 hora local de este viernes para unos 30.000 trabajadores. Los representantes sindicales han señalado en una rueda de prensa recogida por 'Bloomberg' que los puntos del acuerdo no eran lo suficientemente buenos y que la oferta no compensaba los 16 años de estancamiento salarial, el aumento de los gastos sanitarios y la deslocalización de miles de empleos sindicales. Por su parte, Boeing ha emitido un comunicado en el que muestra su compromiso para restablecer la relación con los trabajadores y el sindicato, además de volver a la mesa para alcanzar un nuevo acuerdo. Boeing atraviesa una crisis de reputación, de seguridad y económica desde 2019, cuando dos aviones 737 MAX sufrieron accidentes fatales. Tras esto, se han producido otros incidentes, como la caída de una parte del fuselaje de un avión de Alaska Airlines a principios de este año.

author: Julianna Frieman
title: ‘Not Perfect’: Kamala Gives an Ultra-Cringy Response to Dreaded Job-Interview Question
text: ( Julianna Frieman , Headline USA ) Democrat presidential nominee [Kamala Harris](/tag/kamala-harris) was asked a notoriously dreaded job-interview question Wednesday evening during a [CNN](/tag/cnn) townhall: What is your greatest weakness? The male questioner listened attentively from his place in the audience as Harris struggled to describe her weaknesses and how she would overcome them. “That’s a great question, Joe. Well, I am certainly am not perfect. Let’s start there,” Harris began with a chuckle. “I think that, I, perhaps a weakness, some would say— but I actually think it’s a strength,” she said, scrunching up her face, “I really do value having a team of very smart people around me who bring to my decision-making process different perspectives.” Harris told the questioner she constantly tells her team, “Let’s kick the tire on that.” CNN’s [Anderson Cooper](/tag/anderson-cooper) asked the vice president a similar question about learning from past mistakes, to which Harris—who took a moment before speaking—had difficulty providing a clear answer to as well. COOPER: Is there something you can point to in your life that is a mistake that you've learned from? KAMALA: "I have worked very hard to make sure that I'm well-versed on issues." The Kamala you see stumbling in every unscripted answer she gives is what she calls "well-versed." [pic.twitter.com/fmENkOtpvI]— Trump War Room (@TrumpWarRoom) [October 24, 2024] “I mean, I’ve made many mistakes. And they range from, you know, if you’ve ever parented a child, you know you make lots of mistakes,” Harris, who never gave birth to a child of her own, said with nervous laughter. Harris is married to [Doug Emhoff](/tag/doug-emhoff), who has a 25-year-old daughter, Ella, and a 30-year-old son, Cole, from his previous marriage of 16 years. The Democrat nominee tied the knot with Emhoff in August 2014. “In my role as vice president, I mean, I’ve probably worked very hard at making sure that I am well-versed on issues. And, um, I think that is very important. It’s a mistake not to be well-versed on an issue and be compelled to answer a question,” Harris said with a smirk. Julianna Frieman is a freelance writer published by the Daily Caller, Headline USA, The Federalist, and The American Spectator. Follow her on Twitter at @JuliannaFrieman .

author: 齐琪
title: 重庆："毕业季"校园双选会促就业
text:
2025年6月11日，重庆建筑科技职业学院，学生在校园双选会现场与用人单位交流。当日，“渝快就・教育强市区县行”重庆建筑科技职业学院2025毕业生双选会暨2026届实习对接会举行。本次双选会围绕重庆33618制造产业体系，聚焦学校优势专业，共吸引重庆长安汽车股份有限公司、中国核工业二三建设有限公司、重庆京东方显示技术有限公司等100余家优质企业到场招聘，提供6700余个就业岗位，涵盖智能制造、建筑业、酒店管理、交通运输等多个领域，吸引了众多毕业生到场求职。本次双选会设立职业指导专区、三支一扶和征兵入伍等咨询服务站点，为毕业生提供现场咨询。
据了解，2025年重庆将举办6000场以上招聘会，提供100余万个就业岗位。同时，围绕政策宣传进校园、招聘服务进校园、就业指导进校园、创业服务进校园、职业培训进校园、困难帮扶进校园等“六进”，全市全年计划开展公共就业服务进校园活动500场以上。

author: Bruno Figurski (correspondant local de presse)
title: Un nouvel espace à découvrir au jardin pédagogique de Petite-Forêt
text:
Un nouvel espace à découvrir au jardin pédagogique de Petite-Forêt
À Petite-Forêt, le jardin pédagogique est ouvert depuis le 1er avril après une transformation par les agents du pôle développement durable. Ces derniers ont réorganisé, agrandi et embelli le jardin afin d’offrir à ses hôtes de nouveaux espaces. Poules, chèvres, lapins, cailles du Japon, pigeons… Ils ont chacun leur espace.
Dans les nouveautés, la vie aquatique est maintenant présente, avec la création d’un petit bassin où nagent des carpes koï en attendant que poussent des plantes. L’ensemble des planches de cultures a été revu. Le jardin est pris en charge, en grande partie, par une classe de CP de l’école Paul-Vaillant-Couturier, qui assurera également l’intégralité de la communication du jardin par la création d’affiches avec photo pour désigner les animaux.
« Découvrir le monde du jardinage »
Le jardin pédagogique est un lieu d’apprentissage, de découverte et de partage en libre accès pour les habitants de la commune mais aussi pour les écoles. « Une belle façon pour les élèves de découvrir le monde du jardinage, tout en étant sensibilisés aux causes environnementales et au bien-être animal » explique-t-on du côté de la mairie. Un groupe d’écoliers se rend dans chaque enclos pour nourrir, abreuver, ramasser les œufs et passer un moment avec les animaux.
Une à deux fois par mois, une animation au jardin pédagogique est proposée par Élise Berlemont, étudiante en apprentissage de gestion et protection de la nature en poste au pôle développement durable. Outre l’entretien quotidien du jardin et de la ruche, elle propose des animations dans le but de mieux comprendre l’écosystème reproduit dans le jardin pédagogique et de sensibiliser les élèves aux comportements à adopter auprès des animaux et de la flore.
Une cure de jouvence aussi pour la cité de la Renaissance à Lourches
Un accident sur l’A23 a provoqué de longs bouchons ce jeudi matin
Et si vous visitiez le terril d’Escaudain samedi matin ?
Poursuivez votre lecture sur ce(s) sujet(s) :
Petite-Forêt (Nord)
